Package edu.iis.powp.controllers.ink

Class SimmulationInkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iis.powp.controllers.ink.SimmulationInkController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InkControllerInterface, Observed

    public class SimmulationInkController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InkControllerInterface, Observed
    Implementation of Ink Controller for simulation. Singleton design pattern. One unit of ink can be used to draw line of one unit length.
